title: Augustinus
subtitle: An escape game where you have to escape from the grounds of an evil manor.

heroImage.caption: Watch out! don't get caught by those heretics...

sections.title: Overview
content: This was a three-people team project, created as the final project for the Unity engineer training program at the Institute for Information Industry.

features.name: Player interactions with objects
features.description: The main gameplay was all about the player escaping(moving), interacting with boxes, objectives.

features.name: X-ray shader
features.description: Player can activate see-through effects ingame.

sections.title: Development Process
content: Through discussion with teammates, we decided to mimic exist games to finalize the development direction and speed up the process. I was responsible for the main gameplay and systems.

Given that we were all beginners, the development process was a mess, but we made sure to finish the most important part of the game, and discussed the solution with the teachers. As a result, we delivered a fairly well completed game to showcase.

challenges.title: Challenge 1: Learning programming and the tools
challenges.problem: We were under a very intense schedule to learn programming and Unity.
challenges.solution: I spent extra time practicing and searched for the solutions from the internet.

challenges.title: Challenge 2: Team member sometimes break the game
challenges.problem: With lesser knowledge for development, sometimes the game will encounter several errors after a simple git pull.
challenges.solution: I discussed the issue with the member, I helped eliminating the errors right after his commit, making sure the workflow was smooth.

sections.title: What I Learned
items: Most of the problems can be solved by just searching on the internet
